catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Midrash ha-Gadol (Leviticus)
author: Adani, David ben Amram
description: Part of a group of four MSS containing Midrash ha-Gadol; see also MS. Opp. Add. 4° 124a, MS. Opp. Add. 4° 124b and MS. Opp. Add. 4° 124d. In the margins (fols. 1r-272v): Sefer Tsedah la-derekh by Yiḥya ben Seʻadyah Alts'ahri (later addition).
